using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

#define ull unsigned long long
#define ill long long int
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
#define F(i,a,n) for(i=(a);i<(n);++i)
#define FD(i,a,n) for(int i=(a);i>=(n);--i)
#define FE(it,x) for(it=x.begin();it!=x.end();++it)
#define V(x) vector<x>
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define Sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define M(x,i) memset(x,i,sizeof(x))
#define all(x) x.begin(), x.end()
#define rall(x) x.rbegin(), x.rend()
#define debug(i,sz,x) F(i,0,sz){cout<<x[i]<<" ";}cout<<endl
#define fr first
#define se second>
#define MAX2(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define MIN2(a,b) a>b?b:a

/* Relevant code begins here */

#define MOD 1000000007
ill dp[1005][1005] ={0};
 ill a[1005][1005]={0};
int main()
{
    ill i,j,k,m,n,p,ans,tmp1,tmp2;



    scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&m,&n,&p);
    F(i,0,p)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&j,&k);
            a[j][k] = 1;

    }
    dp[m][n] = 1;
    for(i = m ; i >= 1 ; i--)
    {
        for(j = n ; j >=1 ;j--)
        {
            if(a[i][j] == 1)
                dp[i][j] = 0;

            if(a[i][j] == 0)
            {

               if(i == m && j ==  n )
               {

               }
               else
                {
                if(i+1 <= m)
                tmp1 = dp[i+1][j];
                else
                tmp1 = 0;

                if(j+1 <=n)
                tmp2 = dp[i][j+1];
                else
                tmp2 =0;

                if(tmp1 == 0 || tmp1 == 1 || tmp2 == 0 || tmp2 == 1)
                dp[i][j] = (tmp1 + tmp2)%1000000007;
                else
                dp[i][j] = (tmp1+tmp2)%1000000007;
               }

            }


        }

    }
 /*   for(i = 1 ; i<= m;i++){
        for(j=1 ;j<=n ;j++)
        printf("%lld ",dp[i][j]);
        printf("\n");
    } */

    if(a[1][1]==1 || a[m][n] == 1)
        printf("0\n");
    else
    printf("%lld\n",dp[1][1]);

    return 0;
}
